Sentencas: The synthesis of nanostructured films of 20 mol% Y2O3 stabilized ZrO2 on corundum (Al2O3) substrates was performed from different sols using dip-coating technique.
Titulo: On the Properties of Yttria-Stabilized Zirconia Thin Films Prepared by Sol-Gel Method

Sentencas: All obtained samples were repeatedly annealed at 800 degrees C temperature after each dipping procedure and fully characterized by X-ray diffraction (XRD) analysis.
Titulo: On the Properties of Yttria-Stabilized Zirconia Thin Films Prepared by Sol-Gel Method

Sentencas: XRD data exhibited that at 800 C temperature nano-sized Y0.2Zr0.8O2 thin films with cubic (Fm-3m) crystal structure have been formed.
Titulo: On the Properties of Yttria-Stabilized Zirconia Thin Films Prepared by Sol-Gel Method

Sentencas: The morphological features of obtained coatings were investigated by scanning electron microscopy (SEM) and atomic force microscopy (AFM).
Titulo: On the Properties of Yttria-Stabilized Zirconia Thin Films Prepared by Sol-Gel Method

Sentencas: The surface tension and hydrophility of the synthesized films were determined by contact angle measurements (CAM).
Titulo: On the Properties of Yttria-Stabilized Zirconia Thin Films Prepared by Sol-Gel Method
